scripts.prepare: mv src/three.js src/three.browser.js && mv src/three.cjs.js src/three.js ; rollup src/index.js -f umd --name VueGL --globals three/build/three.module.js:THREE | babel --out-file index.js --presets env,minify ; mv src/three.js src/three.cjs.js && mv src/three.browser.js src/three.js
